about_the_game:
Turn on the tape to feel like you’re on concert with the original game soundtrack to BlasterBeat! This OST comes with almost an hour of original music composed by Final Sketch, Psynapse, Ijenta, MarkMarker, Sultan and vocals by Faetaria and Julia Marks!

Buying the album directly supports developers and musician for making more music!

This album comes with BPM, Lyrics and extended version of the tracks and with an additional bonus tracks.

With future additions to the game we will updated this album, so you always get all the tracks.

With future additions to the game we will updated this album, so you always get all the tracks.
name: BlasterBeat Original Game Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 800 MB available space
